segments.text: Yes . I'm sorry , but I've lost my passbook .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well . Can you tell me how much you have deposited ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Please let me have your name and your savings account number if you remember it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm Bob Brown . But I can't recall my account number .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don't worry , Mr . Brown . Let me try to check it for you . One moment , please . Yes , I have your account number here . The balance is exactly RIB 12,000
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank goodness . It is still there . Thank you very much .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's my pleasure . Please fill out this lost passbook bill and list the code word you used when you first opened your account .
segments.speaker: S1
